snippet.name: editor
snippet.starttext: <seform:editor id="$${id}" label="$${label}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal|vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" value="$${value}" width="$${width:100%}" height="$${height:100%}" allowsource="$${allowsource:no|yes}" allowformat="$${allowformat:no|yes}" toolbarlist="$${toolbarlist}" note="$${note}" />
